title: Problems with Connection, but only with LoL! (Not other Online Games)[GER]
body:
Hi folks, so i have connection Problems with LoL. So far, so (not) well. 
The thing is, i am a traitor and play e.g. Dota 2 and CS:GO. And in both games, i dont have any connection issues. Anybody got an idea why thats the case? Is it because valve Server are "better" or is it a Problem of mine? 
Thanks for help, your Maximus

replies.body: Awwwww there's no traitors here just because you play DOTA2! It sounds like your network is having problems getting a good signal with our servers, it doesn't mean there's anything wrong with your connection but the internet can be a pretty fickle mistress. Let's check up on your network really quick by updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but definitely let me know if that doesn't seem to help!
